subject: p15131736
History: Year old woman with CHF exacerbation, pulmonary edema, interval change.
Impression: In comparison to previous radiograph of 1 day earlier, marked cardiomegaly persists, accompanied by pulmonary vascular congestion and slight improvement in pulmonary edema. Interval worsening of right retrocardiac opacity, likely due to atelectasis. Persistent small pleural effusions.
